009package imagingbook.core.jdoc;
010
011public abstract class JavaDocUtils {
012
013    public static final String JAVADOC_BASE_URL = "https://imagingbook.github.io/imagingbook-public/javadoc/";
014
015    /**
016     * Returns the JavaDoc URL for the specified class. By default the base URL is {@link #JAVADOC_BASE_URL}, which is
017     * overridden by the value of a {@link JavaDocBaseUrl} annotation present at the module level (in file
018     * {@code module-info.java}). Of course there is no guarantee that the associated JavaDoc exists at the returned
019     * address.
020     *
021     * @param clazz a class reference
022     * @return a string with the web URL for the JavaDoc information of the specified class
023     */
024    public static String getJavaDocUrl(Class<?> clazz) {
025        Module module = clazz.getModule();
026        Package pkg = clazz.getPackage();
027
028        String baseUrl = null;
029
030        if (module.isAnnotationPresent(JavaDocBaseUrl.class)) {
031            baseUrl = module.getAnnotation(JavaDocBaseUrl.class).value();
032        }
033        else if (pkg != null && pkg.isAnnotationPresent(JavaDocBaseUrl.class)) {
034            baseUrl = pkg.getAnnotation(JavaDocBaseUrl.class).value();
035        }
036
037        if (baseUrl != null) {
038            String classCName = clazz.getCanonicalName();
039            return baseUrl + "/" + classCName.replace('.', '/') + ".html";
040        }
041        else {
042            return null;
043        }
044    }
045
046}
